sen.j: 三輪文屋（みわのふみや、生年不詳－皇極天皇2年（643年）？）は、飛鳥時代の人物。
sen.e: MIWA no Fumiya (year of birth unknown - 643?) was a person in the Asuka period.
MIWA no Fumiya (the year of birth unknown - 643?) was a person in the Asuka period.
MIWA no Fumiya (the year of birth unknown - 643?) was a person in the Asuka period.

sen.j: 聖徳太子の子である山背大兄王に仕え、上宮王家襲撃事件では山背大兄王とともに生駒山へ逃れた。
sen.e: He served Prince Yamashiro no oe, a son of Prince Shotoku, and took refuge in Mt. Ikoma with Prince Yamashiro no oe in the Jogu Oke Attack.
sen.cmt: 「上宮王家襲撃事件」定訳不明。
sen.e: He served for Prince YAMASHIRO no Oe who was Prince Shotoku's son; He ran up to Mt. Ikoma with Prince YAMASHIRO no Oe when they were attacked at the Jogu Oke family.
sen.cmt: 文法を訂正しました。上宮王家襲撃事件の説明を追加しました。
sen.e: He served for Prince YAMASHIRO no Oe who was Prince Shotoku's son; He ran up to Mt. Ikoma with Prince YAMASHIRO no Oe when they were attacked at the Jogu Oke family.

sen.j: この事件で自害、戦死したと言われる。
sen.e: It is said that he died by his own hand in the battle of this incident.
Nevertheless, it is said that he committed suicide due to this affair.
Nevertheless, it is said that he committed suicide due to this affair.

sen.j: 父は三輪小鷦鷯、子に三輪利金がいる。
sen.e: His father was MIWA no Kosazaki, and his children included MIWA no Toshikane.
sen.cmt: 「小鷦鷯」読み方不明ですが、"Kosazaki" としました。（仁徳天皇の名が「大鷦鷯」と書いて「おおさざき」と読んだことから。《広辞苑》）「利金」読み方不明ですが、"Toshikane" としました。
sen.e: His father was MIWA no Kosazaki; He had some children including MIWA no Toshikane.
His father was MIWA no Kosazaki; He had some children including MIWA no Toshikane.
